block.name: Scaled Signed8 To Complex
block.doc:
This block incorporates an SCHAR_MAX scaling factor into the conversion. This is generally useful for inputs such as raw HackRF files where the input bytes represent a -1 to 1.0 scale.
For comparison: IChar to Complex uses a out = (float)in This block converts using out = (float)in / (float)SCHAR_MAX
